    • MenuController

      public MenuController(VendingMachineService vendingMachineService)
      Overloaded constructor for the MenuController class.
      Parameters:
      vendingMachineService - the vending machine service to be used

  • Method Details

    • setVendingMachineService

      public void setVendingMachineService(VendingMachineService vendingMachineService)
      Sets the vending machine service to be used by this controller.
      Parameters:
      vendingMachineService - the vending machine service to be used

    • setDriverStage

      public void setDriverStage(javafx.stage.Stage driverStage)
      Sets the driver stage to be used by this controller.
      Parameters:
      driverStage - the driver stage to be used

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller. The initialization involves setting up listeners for the list views and setting the action for the buttons. It also initializes the vending machine service.

    • showButtons

      public void showButtons()
      Makes the buttons visible.

    • hideButtons

      public void hideButtons()
      Hides the buttons.

    • enableButtons

      public void enableButtons()
      Enables the buttons.

    • disableButtons

      public void disableButtons()
      Disables the buttons.

    • goBackToMainMenu

      public void goBackToMainMenu()
      Resets the main menu UI to its default state and sets up the main menu button actions.

    • createVendingMachine

      public void createVendingMachine()
      Sets up the UI and button actions for the vending machine creation screen.

    • testVendingMachine

      public void testVendingMachine()
      Sets up the UI and button actions for the vending machine testing screen.

    • vendingFeatures

      public void vendingFeatures()
      Sets up the UI and button actions for the vending features screen.

    • chooseRegularVendingMachine

      public void chooseRegularVendingMachine()
      Displays a list of regular vending machines that the user can select for testing. If no regular vending machines are available, an error message is displayed.

    • chooseSpecialVendingMachine

      public void chooseSpecialVendingMachine()
      Displays a list of special vending machines that the user can select for testing. If no special vending machines are available, an error message is displayed.

    • openRegular

      public void openRegular()
      Opens a new window with the UI for the selected regular vending machine. The UI will either be the vending machine interface or the maintenance interface, depending on the value of isInMaintenanceMode.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if driverStage has not been initialized.

    • openSpecial

      public void openSpecial()
      Opens a new window with the UI for the selected special vending machine. The UI will either be the vending machine interface or the maintenance interface, depending on the value of isInMaintenanceMode.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if driverStage has not been initialized.

    • maintenanceFeatures

      public void maintenanceFeatures()
      Sets the UI to maintenance mode, where the user can select a vending machine type (regular or special) for maintenance.

    • regularVendingMachine

      public void regularVendingMachine()
      Prepares the UI for the creation of a new regular vending machine. The user is prompted to enter a name for the machine.

    • onEnterKeyPressed

      public void onEnterKeyPressed(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      Handles the Enter key event for the text field where the vending machine name is entered. If the entered name is not empty, a new vending machine of the appropriate type is created based on the current titleText.
      Parameters:
      event - the KeyEvent to handle.

    • specialVendingMachine

      public void specialVendingMachine()
      Prepares the UI for the creation of a new special vending machine. The user is prompted to enter a name for the machine.

    • exitProgram

      public void exitProgram()
      Exits the program.
